list.title: Booqista - Consumer Web App
list.desc: An online platform or marketplace that connects consumers to the best service providers or merchants
features: Search and discover a wide range of services and offers from merchants
Book services and schedule appointments with merchants
View merchant profiles, listings, services, prices
Review and rate services
key_contributions: Implement profile information and account settings
Implement managing of bookings and appointments
Implement authentication related features (sign up, log in, forgot password, etc.)
Test app and add bug fixes

list.title: Booqista - Merchant Web App
list.desc: A business platform that allows businesses and merchants to keep their services up and running in the CWA marketplace; it is packed with tools that they can use to manage their business
features: Setup and manage business account
Post and manage listings and services
Manage the appointments and bookings from consumers
View reviews and ratings from consumers

list.title: ApplyBPO
list.desc: An online platform which connects users and job applicants with potential employers and job postings; it also allows managing of employees thru team and departments; track team productivity through time-tracking and other HRIS features
features: Manage and setup accounts
Upload an interview video and find potential jobs
See job postings
Manage teams and departments
Track time and productivity of employees
Issue contracts, disclipinary forms, etc.
Connect with businesses to help them manage international offices
key_contributions: Code and implement APIs in the backend
Code and implement frontend logic and features
Design backend object models and schema

list.title: BPOSeats
list.desc: An online platform which allows businesses to manage their teams and to set up offices and infrastructures (even from other countries)
features: Manage and setup business accounts
Book offices
Manage amenities, locations, and offices
Manage teams, departments, and HRs
Add job postings
Hire and manage employees
Track office and team productivity through time-tracking and other HRIS features
key_contributions: Code and implement APIs in the backend
Code and implement frontend logic and features
Design backend object models and schema

list.title: Booqista - Consumer Mobile App
list.desc: A mobile platform that connects consumers to the best service providers or merchants
features: Search and discover a wide range of services and offers from merchants
Book services and schedule appointments with merchants
View merchant profiles, listings, services, prices
Review and rate services
Setup and manage consumer account
key_contributions: Design UI/UX elements and code the interface and templates

list.title: Up On Time (UOT)
list.desc: A sample app built in Flutter; the goal is to manage alarms and sync calendar events and notify the user
features: Manage alarm settings (sync window, sync time, etc.)
Sync calendar events to app
Send a push notification to the user about the next alarm
key_contributions: Explore the ins and outs of Flutter
Learn the basic of design, layouting, and UI principles in Flutter

list.title: GuessWhut!?
list.desc: An online video platform for playing charades with friends. Awarded as top app among the 5 competitors in the internship
features: Generate a game session online
Invite friends to the game session
Play with friends remotely  via video communication
Draw in the screen to help in guessing
Chat with other users thru the chat feature
Track high scores
Display in-game ads for revenue generation
key_contributions: Implement the video communication feature through OpenTok
Tests, code reviews, and bug fixes

list.title: Building a Sign Language Gesture Classifier Using LSTM
list.desc: The general objective of this study is to develop a machine learning model based on the Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) model
list.owner: Thesis Paper for BS in Computer Science
features: Generate a machine learning model based on the LSTM model to classify 100 sign language gesture videos which correspond to common action words used in grocery stores
Gather and extract dataset using Kinect sensor and a mobile camera
Preprocess the dataset and extract the important features (Skeleton data, Depth data, Hand Pose data)
Train the model
The goal is to focus only on the important aspects of building a machine learning model: data acquisition, preprocessing, feature extraction and training and does not provide an final app with a GUI
key_contributions: Generate a marchine learning model based on the LSTM to classify a gesture video with a corresonding meaning or text
Acquire dataset using Kinect sensor and a camera
Preprocess dataset (deletion or unimportant frames, cleaning of data)
Extract features (e.g. the shape of hands and body postures)
Consider the joint orientation, joint position, hand pose key points and skeleton, body pose key points and skeleton, and depth data
Use Hyperas to find the best combination of hyperparameters (batch size, number of epochs, and learning rate) for the LSTM model
Use OpenCV (computer vision library in python and supports model execution for ML)

list.title: Django Poll App
list.desc: A basic poll application built in Django (can view polls and vote in them; can add, change, and delete polls)
features: User can view polls and vote in them
A user admin can add, change, and delete polls
key_contributions: Explore the ins and outs of Django
Integrate Django with CSS, HTML, and Javascript

list.title: Simulation of Memory Management and Allocation Strategies
Enter a binary number and generate its square wave graphs
Enter a binary number to generate its digital-to-analog modulations
Enter a binary number to generate its hamming code
BigFoot Island - a children's made game in Javascript
list.desc: People in BigFoot island are cursed with big feet as a punishment for making too much carbon footprint. Your goal is to maintain the size of your feet by reducing your carbon footprint. The game has 4 levels.
list.owner: Thesis Paper for a friend in VSU, the goal is to teach kids the importance of the planet by reducing their carbon footprints. The goal is to find out if games and game design can have an effect in a child's awareness of climate issues.

list.title: Snate the Bookish Snake
list.desc: Snate is a unique snake that grows by eating the letters of the alphabet! To proceed to the next level, you  must help Snate in eating the right letters to complete the current level's goal: a word, a phrase, or sentence.
list.owner: In partial fulfillment of CMSC 131 (Introduction to Computer Organization and Machine-Level Programming)
features: Implement a main screen
Implement main game screen
Make the snake move around the screen
Eat the letters in the screen
Randomize new letters in the screen
Add a help screen
Track the high score
Display game score
key_contributions: Add, edit, delete data in array in Assembly
Design and code the game logic

list.title: Mini Statistics Package
list.desc: Allow real time computations on data sampling, data representation, and measures of central tendency; Write a project which combines the different concepts in basic statistics
features: Implement sampling methods - Simple random sampling, systematic samplic, stratified sampling
Present data thru graphs (histogram vs pie charts) and statistical table (percentages, midpoints, etc) - categorical data, numerical data
Compute measures of central tendency (mean, median, mode) - ungrouped and grouped data
